A day is not the rising and setting of the sun - It is 24 hours.
An hour is not the motion of the clock - It is a day divided into 24 parts and consists of 3600 equal parts known as seconds.
The sunrise and sunset are different in different parts of the Earth as we move away from the Equator and towards the poles.
A 'time' is something that is passing by even if we do not count, measure or standardize it.
It does not depend on our location at any given point in time.
Speed is irrelevant as it is a relative quantity.
The car sitting idle on the road is not static, it is moving through space, its displacement w.r.t. other planets, stars and galaxies is not equal to zero.
No matter how fast we go the displacement at any given fraction of a second(ds) will be too small to make any difference, and thus our motion through space is independent of our motion through time.
Frankly, the twin experiment was a ruse and a publicity stunt as clearly there are way too many variables there.
The prerequisites of the experiment could not be attained even if they were genetically cloned.
Either Einstein has been misinterpreted here or he was just plain wrong!

Time is a measure and space is not a thing.
You may be able to go forward in time, and you may be able to slow down time to near stopping, but you cannot go back in time. This is a Fairy Tale. Light does not have a speed limit, it is a rate of induction. Thoughts are instantaneous.

Time travel is very simple...not easy...simple.

To go forward in time you just have to be able to approach an Event Horizon and still be able to break free from the black holes gravitational pull. The closer you get to the Event Horizon the slower time moves for you. So you just have to know how long to stay near it before you retreat away from it. Moving backwards in time is much harder but is not impossible.

You have to be able to achieve a very high velocity and go directly towards the singularity of an ultramassive black hole. Time stops at the speed of light and at the Event Horizon. Both velocity and gravity affect the flow of time, if you combine extreme velocity with extreme gravity it is possible to reverse time. Very tricky to calculate just how far it will reverse though.

If you are able to get close to the speed of light, and the black hole has enough mass so that it's gravitational pull increase your velocity beyond light speed, and then you cross the Event Horizon and then cross back over it, you will exit our universe and enter into the next one over...5th dimensionally speaking.

If instead you go directly into the singularity, at FTL speed, you end up outside the hourglass in the 6th dimension where there is no such thing as Space/Time, where our creator resides.

The dimensions beyond the 6th are not for us or even for our creator. That is where the true gods exist and they don't want anything to do with us.
